data.title: Compare Salzburg & Zagreb City Weather and Climate
data.meta_description: Comparison of the weather and climate of Salzburg, Austria with Zagreb City, Croatia including average yearly temperature, rainfalls, snowfalls and more.
data.text:
Salzburg is 314.7 kilometers (195.5 miles) away and has the same time zone with Zagreb City, Croatia. Both Salzburg and Zagreb City are in the same climate zone with Marine west coast, warm summer (Köppen climate classification: Cfb).

Salzburg generally has cooler weather than Zagreb City. The average mean temperature in Salzburg is 8.77°C (47.79°F) while Zagreb City’s temperature is 13.05°C (55.49°F) and the difference is 4.28°C (39.7°F). Salzburg is warmest on average in July, when the day time temperature may reach 18.86°C (65.95°F), while Zagreb City is hottest in July when the average high temperature is 24.36°C (75.85°F). Salzburg is coldest in February when the average low temperature is -5.63°C (21.87°F), while January is the coldest month in Zagreb City, when night time temperature often falls below -1.7°C (28.94°F).

Finally, Salzburg has about 1.32 times less rainfall than Zagreb City, (Salzburg’s 79.88mm vs Zagreb City’s average of 105.7mm).
